alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 4:21PM CST until January 01 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Light snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch through evening. Minor blowing snow may lead to reduced visibility. Very cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero tonight. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
